articles.description:
🌱 13 easy ways to make you more sustainable traveler 👇

Traveling has positive and negative impacts. And as the well-known quote goes 
"You don’t know what you’ve got till it’s gone." Toilet paper is a good example of the meaning of that quote. 

Ok, all jokes aside. ☺️ Below are 13 ways to travel more sustainably.

1. Consider how you get there; Plane, Train, Bus or Bike
2. Think how you fly; non-stop and on biofuels
3. Stay longer = Travel slower
4. Travel and pack light
5. Choose eco-friendly...

McKinsey identified four best practices that can help every company achieve its sustainability goal! articles.title: 13.4 SUSTAINABILITY (Best Practices)

This video is based on PhD research by Bob Willard.

articles.title: 50 Global Best Practices for Sustainable Events | MICE INDIAA | Shekhar

articles.description:
When ESG investors evaluate sustainable businesses, they often narrowly focus on a company’s green product or services. Yet all companies can negatively impact people and the environment, even those working on clean energy solar development and construction.

There's another approach to sustainable investing - one that takes a holistic look at how all portfolio companies impact and interact with society and the planet. This flexible, collaborative, eco-systems thinking can lead to even better ou...

articles.description:

This talk was given at a TEDx event using the TED conference format but independently organized by a local community. Learn more at http://ted.com/tedx
